name: Marbear
review: I have small lashes because of my ethnicity but this product makes my lashes look longer and natural. I have to apply a few coats but not clumpy and stays on all day. Might not want to use going out as it is not dark enough.

name: Missy
review: Best mascara I have ever used doesn't smudge at all stays on and makes my lashes look so so good ! I love it will defiantly be buying it again!

name: Nay
review: Brush was bad from start, returned and opened in store - same thing

name: Disappointed
review: All day felt like there was something in my eyes. Could not wait to get it off.

name: CJ
review: I've used other styles of this mascara and they were ok but I'm not especially fond of this one. I won't purchase it again.

name: Dee
review: Made my Lashes clumpy and flakes a little through my day

name: none
review: I've tried many other waterproof mascaras and have had problems with clumping and difficulty taking it off even with eye makeup removers.

name: Mary Ann Revilla
review: Had never used this product just took the chance and I love it you don't need to over do to get long lashes!  Finally a product I'm satisfied

name: Tracy
review: I love this product! It makes my eyelashes long and adds tons of volume!  I can't believe I never used it before! I use to spend a lot  of money on expensive mascara's that weren't nearly as good as this product. It's reasonably priced and it's excellent!  I will definitely be buying this product again!

name: Annebo
review: I put it in my eyes. Duh?

name: Make up junkie
review: Disappointed thank does not thicken lashes  Pluses does lengthens stays fresh and easy to remove

name: Dawn
review: Truly a waterproof mascara that goes on evenly and adds volume! I love it!!!!!

name: Bina
review: I wish I could say more but I can't and I love all revlon products I use them everyday I just was not crazy about the mascara.

name: Christine
review: I was so upset to learn that Revlon discontinued their 3D PhotoReady mascara; I had been using it for years! In the past week, I had tried 3 new mascaras, none of which gave my naturally long eyelashes the volume that my old mascara had. I was skeptical purchasing this mascara, since it wasn't my usual PhotoReady one, but I decided to give it a shot since it was Revlon. I'm SO happy with my decision. Like I said earlier, my eyelashes are already naturally long, so I don't need the extra length, but this product definitely delivers the volume I was looking for without giving my eyelashes that "spider" look. If you pick at your mascara, it WILL flake - but if you leave it alone, it will be fine. It clumps a little bit the more coats you use, but if you use an eyelash brush or comb, the clumps are easy to get rid of. The tube itself is a little weird to hold because of its shape, but that's obviously not going to deter me from repurchasing! Overall, I love this mascara and I'm happy I gave Revlon a second chance!
